main event: Sighting of a bright, hovering light over Norfolk, Virginia that lasted for approximately 90 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as round in appearance and emitting a yellow-white light, estimated to be the size of a small airplane.
The object appeared to be hovering over the area for the duration of the observation.
At one point during the observation, the object seemed to pulsate or flicker its light.
The witness observed the object through binoculars, which provided a clearer view.
As darkness fell, the object began to fade from view and disappeared.
sighted object: A round, bright light in the sky
